Description: Vessel; made of pottery; vessel consisting of three pieces: a) base consisting of circle of pottery with band of curvilinear decoration, hole at centre; b) bowl with stem that screws into hole in base; c) bowl cover with open-work curvilinear design, knob at centre top.
Acquisition name: Donated by: Frederick George Hilton Price
Acquisition notes: Af1887,0208.1 and 2 are recorded as two bowls of red ware, made at Siout, given by F G Hilton Price.
